name: Delirious Decadence of the Sacred Lord
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  It is said that the controversial mastermind who later came to be known as theSacred Lord of the ineffable city was once imprisoned. The first human toascend, who at the time had not yet attained divine form, showed him greatcompassion.  Thus, after emerging from the mighty wing-shadows of a once-great race, he wasaccepted by the tribe who had once been his.  Since then, he has concealed his true visage beneath a mask, hiding the goldenpatterns that mark it, and resolved to offer up everything to the master whoholds his vow.
